Package it.polimi.ingsw.charactercards

Class InfluenceCharacterCardTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.charactercards.InfluenceCharacterCardTest
public class InfluenceCharacterCardTest extends Object
InfluenceCharacterCardTest tests the InfluenceCharacterCards

  • Constructor Details

    • InfluenceCharacterCardTest

      public InfluenceCharacterCardTest()

  • Method Details

    • initialization

      @BeforeEach public void initialization()
      Method initialization() creates an istance of every Character that has an effect on influence. These instances are saved in a List called influenceCards. This method is called before each test is called.

    • availableTest

      @Test public void availableTest()
      Method availableTest() for every element in influenceCards, tests the method isAvailable(). A true return is expected.

    • costTest

      @Test public void costTest()
      Method tests the initial cost of every CharacterCard contained in influenceCards. The cost is expected to be equal to the initialCost of the CharacterID associated to the CharacterCard.

    • increaseCostTest

      @Test public void increaseCostTest()
      Method tests the ability to increase the cost of the CharacterCard. The cost is expected to be increased by one after the method increaseCost() is called.

    • influenceTestHerald

      @Test public void influenceTestHerald()
      Method tests the effectInfluence() method called when the CharacterID is HERALD. The resulting array is expected to be an array of 0s.

    • influenceTestCentaur

      @Test public void influenceTestCentaur()
      Method tests the effectInfluence() method called when the CharacterID is CENTAUR. The towers present on an island are not calculated. The influence should be decreased by the number of islands merged only for the player that has the island.

    • influenceTestKnight

      @Test public void influenceTestKnight()
      Method tests the effectInfluence() method called when the CharacterID is KNIGHT. The resulting array is expected to have a value of 2 in the position corresponding to the currPlayer. All other position are expected to have a value of 0.

    • influenceTestMushroomPicker

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("MushroomPickerArguments") public void influenceTestMushroomPicker(int islandIndex, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> studentsToBeAdded)
      Method tests the effectInfluence() method called when the CharacterID is MUSHROOMPICKER. The array returned by the method is expected to have a negative value in the position of the player that has the professor of the color corresponding to the Clan parameter. The absolute value corresponds to the number of students present on the island. All other positions are expected to have value 0.
      Parameters:
      islandIndex - index of the island on which the effect is activated
      studentsToBeAdded - students to add on the island to set the initial conditions

    • stepsMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void stepsMotherNatureTest()
      Method tests effectMotherNature() method. effectMotherNature() is expected to return 0.

    • effectPlayerProfessor

      @ParameterizedTest @EnumSource(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan.class) public void effectPlayerProfessor(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
      Method effectProfessorTest() tests the outcome of calling effectPlayerProfessor on a influenceCharacterCard class. The expected result is that a player has to have greater students than any other player.
      Parameters:
      clan - it is the clan of belonging of the students on which we are going to test the effect

    • initialEffectTest

      @Test public void initialEffectTest()
      Method initialEffectTest() tests the method applyInitialEffect(). A true return is expected.

    • applyTest1

      @Test public void applyTest1()
      Method applyTest1() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, Island island). The method is expected to return false for every InfluenceCards except for HERALD .

    • applyTest2

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("applyTest2Arguments") public void applyTest2(Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> students1, Map<it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan,Integer> students2)
      Method applyTest2() tests the method applyEffect(Game game, StudentContainer sc, int[] stud1, int[] stud2). The method when called is expected to return false.
      Parameters:
      students1 - the students to move to the destination (if necessary)
      students2 - the students to move from the destination, in case of an exchange of students (if necessary)

    • createPlayers

      public it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player[] createPlayers()
      Method creates an array of Players. This methods serves as a shortcut for some tests.
      Returns:
      array of Players
